summary: The gun-totin', Bible-thumpin' Preacher Man Bob must right the universal karma accidently set wrong when Brian inadvertantlty kills his obnoxious butt-cleavaged roommate, Wade.
cast: Doug Ciskowski|Caleb Kreischer|Rob Hayward|Kathy Wittes|Laurent Minassian|Jim Larsen|Chris Ferro|Gena O'Neal|Joan Larsen|Bill Larsen|Mojo Nixon|Gus Soudah|Cindy Geary|Kris Arnold|Al Nickley|Avis Nickley|Tubby Higgins|Tom Link
title: Buttcrack
